Texts.Chs: <译文: 霸君要求我们立即前往德尔塔 · 弗雷亚星系。一个奇迹般的发现动摇了我们所知道的一切的基础。我们正在派遣300个区域内的所有科学船到这个地方。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: The Overlords have demanded we head towards the Delta Freya system immediately. Something about a miraculous discovery that shakes the foundations of all that we know. We are dispatching all science vessels within 300 sectors to this location.>
